name: ts-for-gir-soup-3-websocket-example
description: Simple Gjs Soup 3 example app to demonstrate how you can use WebSockets

scripts.build:types: npm run ts-for-gir -- generate Soup-3.0 -e gjs --useNamespace -t esm
scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:client
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:client
scripts.validate: npm run validate:types && npm run validate:app

author: Pascal Garber <pascal@artandcode.studio>
